configuration:
dfs.name.dir /space/hadoop/dfs/name true
dfs.data.dir /space/hadoop/dfs/data true
dfs.datanode.max.xcievers 4096
dfs.permissions false
dfs.replication 3
<% if node.hue.enabled %>
dfs.namenode.plugins org.apache.hadoop.thriftfs.NamenodePlugin Comma-separated list of namenode plug-ins to be activated.
dfs.datanode.plugins org.apache.hadoop.thriftfs.DatanodePlugin Comma-separated list of datanode plug-ins to be activated.
dfs.thrift.address 0.0.0.0:10090
<% end %>
